content: MRG segment mapping to FHIR resource is not existing in google documents. Any information or ballet in progress will help.

We've haven't worked on merge messages (or MRG segment) yet because patient merges are complex and often require a lot of work on the receiving side to process. I think the process for FHIR merges is still in discussion (another Zulip thread pointed to https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PA/Merge+Operation). If merge operation is the right way to go we would have to map to that which is something, I'm not sure the current mapping process is ready for. Sorry we're not more help.
